creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: ten long, narrow panels sewn together along long edges; twisted string fringe along short ends; dark blue, light blue, off-white; dyed design of rows of off-white X-shapes running down length on long edge and center panels; on other panels off-white design running length is butterfly-like shape formed by two mirrored curved white patches
title: Wrapper
